subject: Football
lead_paragraph: PERCY HARVIN, left, became the first player in Florida history to have 100 yards receiving and rushing in a game. He ran for 113 yards and 2 touchdowns, and caught 9 passes for 110 yards.
snippet: PERCY HARVIN, left, became the first player in Florida history to have 100 yards receiving and rushing in a game. He ran for 113 yards and 2 touchdowns, and caught 9 passes for 110 yards.
